website_summaries.verdict: This punching tool is affordable, easy to use, and practical for many jobs. It also comes with numerous accessories and makes variety of hole sizes. A great pick for crafts and hobbies.
pros: Has a revolving punch design that is easy to use, and can punch 6 different sized holes
Users love how well it works for leather crafts
Includes a grinding rod, backup pad, and screwdriver
cons: A few owners wish it could punch larger holes
Prone to breakage if used incorrectly – not suited for metal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for purse straps!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this punch. I used it to add an extra hole to my purse strap. The hole is a tad bigger than the others but the next size down was too small. Lots of hole sizes to choose from. I put a piece of thin cardboard below the strap when I punched the hole, as suggested in the directions.
customer_reviews.author: serumjockey

customer_reviews.title: I’ve got holes !!! And now my shoes fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with shoes being a size 10 but not having wide feet. Often heels I try have straps that are too loose although my foot fits fine. I bought this hoping to find a way to get neat looking holes to extend my straps. Lo and behold this worked perfectly. It’s heavy - works well and punches clean holes. 2 pairs of shoes just got added to the rotation again for me !
customer_reviews.author: Flower Chica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Operate, Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to shorten a couple leather belts but was nervous because I don't have a lot of hand strength. NOT A PROBLEM! It is easy to operate, even for weak little me, and Everything you need is included. Two belts adjusted and back together within five minutes! Speedy delivery too! If your too long belt has a little screw fastening the buckle down and you're looking for a leather punch, get this one - it's GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Works well! Great for the price too.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and easily cuts through leather. I wish the smallest hole was smaller. I am using this to make earrings out of pieces of leather. And the hardware for the ear wires and jump rings is smaller than the smallest hole. So it leaves a little Gap. It's not the worst I just wish it was a tiny bit smaller so you really couldn't see the hole in the leather at all. Seems pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! I love how heavy duty and durable it ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I love how heavy duty and durable it is. It's incredibly sharp and I appreciate that it comes with a sharpener. I use it to add decorative stitching to belts and other leather goods. I also use it to add holes to belts to adjust the size. One of those things you didn't think you would need or want and I'm glad I can help my friends when they need to adjust their belt and have this for fun little projects.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah LeeTop Contributor: Korean Beauty Products

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. Just make certain that you use a regular screwdriver to loosen (slightly) the screw underneath the rotating wheel which allows the user to select the correct punch size. Once loosened, you can rotate the wheel freely and you don't have to loosen or tighten the screw again. Would have liked to receive the template as pictured in the photo but otherwise, happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: AvidAmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: These punch pliers work great for punching perfect holes in leather belts.They are very sturdy and comfortable feeling and well built.The only reason I did not give 5 stars is they came with the punch pad screw untightened and the metal plate was not in position and I ended up punching right thru the pad and ruined the pad.They come with a spare pad but I didn't want to ruin one on the first punch.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money or time. Terrible product, it wouldn't even punch through faux leather, I had a difficult time even cutting through cardboard (with alot of force, even my fiance gave it a squeeze and it didn't punch any better) Also the sizing dial is very hard to turn... disappointed. I am returning this product. The little piece of metal on the strike pad was already getting marks and dents after only a few punches.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan K.

customer_reviews.title: The tubes for making notches are not “high hardness” or “heavy duty”
customer_reviews.text: I literally just got this out of my mailbox, opened the box, and went to make a notch in my daughter’s belt and the tube that makes the notch broke as I was punching!!! Piece of crap wouldn’t waste my money here. definitely not high quality or durable!! Had it for less than 15 minutes and couldn’t even use it one time.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: This is made for a giant, very difficult to use.
customer_reviews.text: The handles are way too far apart and the punch and punch plate too close. For reference I wear large and sometimes extra large gloves and can just barely grasp the handles when the jaws are fully open even while the punch and plate are only about open wide enough to fit 2 pieces of belt leather. Jaws should be farther apart and handles closer together for these to fit mere mortal sized hands.
customer_reviews.author: ADM-Furniture Maker

customer_reviews.title: Broke on second use
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've used it since purchasing, and it just broke. What a piece of crap!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hof

customer_reviews.title: Someone Else's Return
customer_reviews.text: It's obvious that someone else returned this product. The handles were scuffed and the screw that controls the tightness of the sprocket wheel thing shows signs of distress, as does the actual screwdriver. The screw controlling the tension of the sprocket wheel thing cannot be unscrewed. Neither can the screw that holds the plate. Really annoyed at this because I would 100% return this defective item if we weren't in the middle of an actual plague. I gave it two stars because it does punch holes, you just need to make sure you keep it pressed and then turn your punched item around to make sure it punched all the way through. It's a grudging two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great hole punch for belts, etc.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy and high quality hole punch with the little extra's that make it even better. I didn't think I'd use the ruler or some but I must say it came in quite handy measuring the hole distance on my sandals. The punch is easy to grip and punch through your item, I was punching through thick Birkenstock sandal straps and it went right through with ease and left a really clean punch hole. This leather on Birkenstock sandals are really thick so I'm very impressed. Glad I picked this item. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen N

customer_reviews.title: Handles too far apart
customer_reviews.text: I have large hands but these handles are so far apart I can not grip both handles at the same time, I sent mine back. I have a very old pair but they are worn out, they might be old but very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Tomes

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for large hand spread
customer_reviews.text: Good tool and does the job quickly with clean punches. Only draw back I found is trying to operate with one hand. Trying to hold material being worked on with one hand leaves only the other to squeeze the handle with. Unfortunately when opened all the way I had a hard time keeping a solid grip on both levers and would need to set material down and reposition my handhold. (Note: my hands aren't small) Also the nubs added to handle for extra traction will cause a blister very quickly unless wearing gloves or covering handles with something else. Overall this was just the tool I needed to fly through the projects I had planned.
customer_reviews.author: SCrowell

customer_reviews.title: Hot garbage
customer_reviews.text: This hole punch is awful. The grips are super rough and leave these uncomfortable dot marks on your hands, the picture of my hand is after punching a single hole. They also don't cut clean holes, they're ragged and don't go all the way through. And these are clearly made for giant hands. I don't know about you, but I certainly don't have an 8" hand span, which makes these incredibly difficult to hold and maneuver and actually use. The clearance between the punch and the punch plate is also small. Honestly my $6 punch is better than this one. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect holes in my Gucci purse and belt!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a new belt and purse from Gucci but the belt was too big and I wanted my bag to sit higher on my waist. I probably could have taken it into Gucci to have them add holes but didn’t really want to deal with that so bought this and boy is it easy! It was perfect for my belt. The purse holes are obviously different shaped but doesn’t bother me since it sits on my back side. Go with one size bigger than you need - the first one I went with smaller and re punching ir with a bigger size made it look a little sloppy!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Phan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Useful Tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this leather hole puncher! It was so easy to use—it easily cut through the leather with clean edges. I love how sturdy the tool is and that it came with replacement parts, a file (which I used to mark where I wanted the hole, then file away a tiny bit of leather from the edge of the new hole), and a little ruler in its own case! The ruler was perfect for measuring where to put the new hole in relation to the other holes. I had bought belts that were a little too big, and now my belts are useful!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great value at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These pliers just arrived today and they are cutting through leather like nobody's buisness. They are super easy to use also as it requires very little force to make the holes. Aside from the pliers, the kit also comes with a ruler a screw driver and what appears to be a marking device for the leather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself some $, buy this leather hole punch!
customer_reviews.text: The most commonly used leather hole punch in the equestrian sporthorse industry is a Stubben brand, $80 one. YIKES! I bought a super cheap, $9 one from Dover Saddlery first, and it bent and broke within a month. I refused to buy the Stubben leather hole punch, and this one had great reviews online, so I gave this one a try. It's great! Not only does it outperform the Stubben one, but it's far more versatile and hardy than any other leather punch I've owned. Great product. Tempted to buy a second one to give to fellow equine industry friends and coworkers!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for crafters with strength problems
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had found these ages ago. I have arthritis in my hands ; a terdjble thing even wirse if you are a crafter! I was really worrued I would not be able to use them but I shoukdnt have stressed about it... Theh work great and take very little pressure to use ! So happy to find something that doesnt hurt my hands!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: A great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for one use — my daughter has a belt she likes, but it was too loose and she wanted an extra hole. I decided this was cheaper than a new belt, so figured I'd give it a shot. It's obviously not a professional-quality tool, but is well-enough made for light use, and includes a good number of accessories to make this a handy kit. The cut it made was smooth and crisp. I cut three holes, and regretted not being able to make more, as the tool felt very satisfying to use. This is an excellent value for the price. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hollasch

customer_reviews.title: Belt Puncher can punch holes but heavy
customer_reviews.text: All components are inclusive in my purchase and this one works better for than my old belt hole puncher. It is a lot heavier but it performed very well in better holes punched in my leather belts. It is bulkier than my hole puncher so you need to get use to the heavier weight. You also need to adjust the provided set screws to accommodate the different hole sizes. A screwdriver was provided but it requires muscles to un-torque or loosen the screw. No instructions were provided so I had to look at the Amazon website to view the “how to” instructions
customer_reviews.author: WarrenD

customer_reviews.title: Works great on belts!
customer_reviews.text: This product without question greatly exceeded my expectations. It was well built and sharp. It is easy to eyeball where you want the hole. Eyeball it, press lightly and check the slight indention. If all is good, apply medium pressure and you are through the belt. I did all of my (4) belts in 5 minutes and could not be more pleased. I probably won't ever use the tool again, but it more than paid for itself in those 5 minutes. Also, I did use thin cardboard between the belt and the anvil as stated in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Works great, very durable
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed! Some of my sandals get a little stretched after wearing for awhile and I’m already on the last hole so I can’t make them any tighter. Until now! It has multiple hole options so even on the slimmest strap I can still make a small hole. I’ve also used it on a belt that was SUPER thick and it works great. Definitely durable and will last a long time. I’m more upset I didn’t get this sooner, I would have saved some shoes before I got rid of them for being loose!
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Good Tool, study, good value
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what I needed it to do. Since there are some piece, it would be nice if a bag came with it. You do have to take care with protecting the blade and be mindful of what you are cutting (true of any punch). No dial markers make this harder that it should be. And cleaning out snoots was not a seamless as I would have thought. Otherwise, it is a solid tool, feels study, and for the money and my very less than frequent use, I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: AJay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, complete set of tools. Works well for sandals straps adjustments.
customer_reviews.text: Item comes with a complete set of tools to help getting the job done. It has two additional pads, replacement screw, screwdriver, ruler to measure the correct place of your hole and another tool. It also comes with quick instructions. Item is really easy to use and seems to have good quality. Added new holes to a pair of sandals straps in 2 minutes using only a small amount of strength and they are now usable again! Just make sure to add a small piece of cardboard between the pad and your item so the pad lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Thauser

customer_reviews.title: Too new to give thorough review
customer_reviews.text: Appears well made, appreciate the extra items, ruler, cleaning pick, base. I have small hands and arthritis but was able to use this on a thick piece of rubber without difficulty, will be tackling more substantive items in the near future. Would like to have more operation info included, not always able to be near computer. Did not provide stars for sturdiness as I have not used it on anything really hard yet, or dropped it. It appears sturdy. So far pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: maddog

customer_reviews.title: Worth my money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it coz as a petite person, my bags straps are longer and needed extra hole to make it shorter. I am happy and excited about this product coz it makes perfect hole so easy and perfectly. I use it for both leather straps and belt without any issue. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Arv

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: The screw was not able to adjust so that I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Sifika

customer_reviews.title: Just Alright, Not Great!
customer_reviews.text: Punches holes, not exactly perfectly but alright. Wouldn't use on designer stuff personally but generic stuff, it would be alright! Doesn't have size indicators on handle, you need to count from small to big per click (dumb design if you ask me, almost every other one has it indicated) such a simple thing that was neglected for convenience. Pictured is a black "ruler" or hole measuring indicator, this isn't included individually, it's actually just on the box itself. You do however get what you pay for, it's a value if saving money is your thing for a few bucks and you don't mind dealing with these little nuisances.
customer_reviews.author: Aren H.

customer_reviews.title: This punch is A+++
customer_reviews.text: I needed to punch a hole in the leather straps of some new shoes & this tool really delivered. I love that it comes with extra parts & the handy little metal ruler for perfect spacing. Very sturdy, easy to use, & a great value. So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Stark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, punches clean
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this punch tool to add shoelace holes to a pair of suede boots. I tried it out on an old leather belt first and it worked surprisingly well - left a clean hole and was very easy to punch. It worked great on my boots. The little pokey tool came in handy to get rid of any leather bits that remained. I would buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Good product!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I have a huge collection of belts and most of them need new holes. It works on leather and on fake leather materials. I got trigger happy and made probably 20 new holes in things in one sitting and it stayed sharp and effective. On some thicker leather i suggest punching a hole as much as possible and then flipping it over and re punching and give a little rotation while pressing hard as to not tear through the leather but get a crisp detachment before pulling the hole out of the belt.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. Don’t Even Hesitate.
customer_reviews.text: You know that the alterations places charge you $5-10 to put a new hole in your belt? If you have a waist that is in between belt sizes, this is your new best friend. (Your friends will also be calling you to use this and you’ll be making new friends!) So order it. Heavy duty, comes with instructions but if you’ve used a paper hole punch, I doubt you’ll need instructions. Has several different size options for holes. I used this on very expensive designer belts and very cheap Forever 21 belts and didn’t have any issue with either!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Maria

customer_reviews.title: Very strong - very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Nice and strong and sharp! The directions do say it is best to put cardboard between the item you are punching and the other side of the punch. I found when I did this that the punch went straight through the cardboard as well. Chipboard may work better than cardboard. I still need to try that one... but all in all this is an excellent punch!
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser of items

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Heavy Duty!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had several belts, sandals, and purse straps that needed additional holes for a custom fit. This inexpensive hole punch did everything I asked it to do- absolutely perfectly! As another reviewer suggested, I put cardboard behind the material to be punched to make it easier to punch and to make cleaner holes. I am now looking through my closet and house to see what else needs new holes!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to put a couple of holes in a canvas LV item I own in order to put a shoulder strap on it. I purchased this hole puncher and it's so easy to use! It doesn't even take much effort or strength to punch the hole into the material, which is a departure from leather punches I've used in the past. Comes with little extra tools as well (mini ruler, replacement pad for the punch, tool to clean debris out the hole once it's punched, etc.), which I appreciated! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great low cost hole punch
customer_reviews.text: This worked so well, I had to jump on and write a review as soon as I used it. I found a leather replacement band for my Apple Watch that I absolutely LOVED, but I have very small wrists and sadly, the watch was just a tad too loose on the smallest hole. Rather than return the band, I figured I’d give this a go, and I’m so glad I did. This leather hole punch is sturdy and easily punched through the watch band (I admittedly could have used the next puncher head size). The heads are easy to rotate through and feel hardy enough to have punched through thicker leather than my watch band. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: E. Shaul

customer_reviews.title: This was 10x better than my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I used this on both a thick leather belt and my Birkenstock’s. I was surprised that for the price this worked SO WELL. I saw it on a hack to save belts and was skeptical. Until I needed another hole for my shoes, so I gave in. THIS IS 10/10!!! I recommend to my friend and she also got one! This is a money saver for your products! There’s 6 sizes (the smallest is used in the picture for the shoes) and the larger holes I used for my belts but there was still 3 bigger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Broken during first use.
customer_reviews.text: Legit broke the second hole I tried to punch with it. Crumpled with just me squeezing the handle. Do not purchase this one.
customer_reviews.author: To

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with professional results
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value and so easy to use. Extends the life of any built. The hole punctures and clean and professional looking. You can’t tell the difference unless you have a built with oval or teardrop holes. Follow the instructions and use a piece of cardboard below the belt when using the hole puncher. It protects the copper base / anvil from wear and tear. It does include an extra copper base/anvil just in case. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made punch
customer_reviews.text: Punch doesn't align perpendicular to brass pad so cutting edge is not cutting evenly through thickness of substrate material. Using cardboard backing (recommended to lengthen increase the life of the pad) does not overcome the problem of the cut passing through the material unevenly. Also the 4.5mm punch arrived with a ragged cutting edge with an obvious burr on it. The kit box asks that I contact the manufacturer directly if I am not 100% satisfied, but there is nothing to indicate who or where they might be reached. I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: grace lenox

customer_reviews.title: Useless, handles will bruise your hands
customer_reviews.text: I am very dissatisfied with the puncher. The smallest hole (which I need) just doesn't work. It only mark's the material but doesn't cut, not even plain office paper. And the grip handle bruises the hands when trying to punch.
customer_reviews.author: YOM

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a slim kid. He bought this expensive belt that he didnt want to cut much so I told him we had to make additional holes. He didnt want to compromise the authenticity qualities of the belt (I guess ppl would think the belt was fake if it has too many holes. Teenagers!) He eventually decided to make additional holes. The product is sturdy and worked beautifully on my son's belt. He was very happy with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: OneofaKAI

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Solid device. Works well even through really thick leather. It’s a bit difficult to select the hole size desired because it only turns in one direction so if you miss it then you gotta cycle through everything again. Can’t seem to figure out how to get the leather holes out of the punch, they do eventually fall out with more holes punched though..
customer_reviews.author: Chamo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality & Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product and will definitely get a lot of use out of this for home projects and DIYs. It doesn't leave any stains or grease marks on the leather and it punches through the leather easily. It even comes with cleaning tools and instructions to make it as easy to use as possible. This one is definitely worth the very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly suited!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought my son a leather belt that was a little too large for him. This worked perfectly in making another hole for the belt to fit him! It comes with a neat little kit that has a small screwdriver, a second punch plate, and a small file. The only downside was the screwdriver is too short to get a good grip on to loosen the adjustment screw. No matter. We have plenty of screwdrivers that suited the task perfectly. Product is made sturdy and worked exactly as indicated. I would certainly recommend to anyone needing to punch some holes!
customer_reviews.author: Perfectlyme4now

customer_reviews.title: Cuts Through Leather Like Butter!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic Punch! Buy it! It comes with everything you need to make a perfect hole the first time, right out of the box. I lost a lot of weight and my pants were falling off me. I needed to make extra holes in my belts. This worked like a dream! You won't be sorry you purchased it... it has different size holes for different types of belt holes, too. It is built to be durable as well. I would imagine if you are a craft person, it seems to be built with you in mind, as it appears to be built to last, as it is made with excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for belts
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what I needed. Bought a custom leather belt but it didn't come with enough holes in it. This got the job done and it's a tool I'll own for life. Price is right and saves a headache.
customer_reviews.author: jhanks23

customer_reviews.title: No brainer.
customer_reviews.text: Don't think twice about buying this. ITS A FANTASTIC PRODUCT. Have used in primarily to punch holes in belts as I have lost some weight and needed smaller belts. It goes through leather like a very sharp knife going through butter. Very nice perfect holes with no irregularities or issues. I have a couple of 100 plus dollar belts and was very reluctant to use this as first. After a couple of dry runs, I took the plunge. This is the best 15 dollars I have spent in a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Aon

customer_reviews.title: Securing Catch Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: The small catch that you rotate to secure the punch in its closed position didn't rotate enough to lock the punch. I had to take a file and remove some material from it before it would seat properly. I figured ten minute with a file was worth the hassle of returning it and maybe getting another one the same. I gave it a two star rating for that.
customer_reviews.author: Siron

customer_reviews.title: Clean Holes
customer_reviews.text: It made good clean holes in my belt as advertised. It takes strong hands to use on a thick leather belt. There were no instructions. It is necessary to loosen two screws to adjust the device before you can use it. The included screw driver is too small so you will need to use a better one to loosen the two screws.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pete

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a bit oily/dirty but wasn’t sure if it was normal as it is a tool, but I kept it. It works great!!!!! I already fixed all my belts. The tool is a bit hard to rotate but I guess it’s normal and what makes it sturdy (and only rotates in one direction so if you’re not sure which size you need, hesitating between 2 sizes, you can’t go back and forth).
customer_reviews.author: ATNT100

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for belts
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for punching a couple extra holes in my belt. I read reviews of other people that said it was terrible and I gotta say, I couldn't disagree more. It was super easy to use and took very little pressure to punch through my belts. I added a picture to show the holes in my belt. They are the two holes on the end of the belts and they look like they have always been there.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Perez

customer_reviews.title: A lot of tool for the money...works beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: Certainly the best leather hole punch I have ever owned. The combination of age and weakness in grip gendered by diabetes had made my old fashioned punch unusable in my hands.. This new one is very high quality and has plenty of power to handle even very heavy leather easily. The little exras included in the package are a nice touch, too. The immediate impression is of very high quality and great value...what's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on the first try!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small wrist and needed one more hole on my new leather Apple watch band. I was a little worried with some of the reviews where it broke or didn't punch thru - but it worked on the first try. I placed a piece of cardboard between my watchband and the metal plate (as instructed) - don't know if that makes a difference or not but punched a clean hole. I can now where my watchband without it spinning around my wrist. Would recommend this hole puncher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy With The Product
customer_reviews.text: This product worked as advertised. Advice to prolong the life of the brass pad. When punching a hole, don't press so hard that the punch leaves an indentation on the pad. Slowly increase the grip pressure until there is a light click, indicating a through punch (it may leave a "hanging chad"). Then flip the belt over and punch again through the same hole to completely remove the leather. Trying to punch through and completely remove the punched leather will leave an indentation in the pad. I realized that after the 2nd hole was punched.
customer_reviews.author: son l.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a leather MCM crossbody, but it hung lower than I liked. I was going to take it somewhere, maybe a shoe repair place, and have them add an additional hole to the strap. However I accidentally came across this and thought why not try it... And it worked perfectly! I was really happy with how it turned out and glad I took the chance with it.
customer_reviews.author: KMags

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first hole punched...
customer_reviews.text: Tried to punch a hole in some leather and it broke on the first hole... Sending it back...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased this for $12 bucks instead of the $20 bucks ones. I paid for next day delivery an instantly punched holes in a too tight (small) Coach belt and holes in a too loose (too big for upper waist) gucci belt. I didn't want my belts ruined since they are expensive. I'm very pleased with the holes they look like the holes that came pre-punched in my belts. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Student of Hardknocks

customer_reviews.title: Saved my belt.
customer_reviews.text: Lost a fair amount of weight, not on purpose. This punched holes that looked just like the originals in my favorite belt. It was helped by the little ruler, with a slipcover yet, and the rasp that I assume was intended to clean up edges but wasn't needed for that at all, that came with it. I used the pointy end of the rasp to mark where to punch. Very pleased. IMHO, anyone who says it doesn't punch through is not using light cardboard or folded paper as instructed.
customer_reviews.author: tbyg

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a double action lever hole punch before and I wasn't expecting much but this thing blew me away. It's far easier to use than any other hole punch I've ever owned. I put a hole in a belt with my old punch and it was murder on my hands and left a rough ugly hole, then I repeated the process with the new punch and it was a night and day difference. The new one went through like a hot knife through butter. I could not be happier with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I lve how simple it was to punch holes in my belts. ALl my belts needed adjustments and previously I had to pay $1 for each punch and now I can do as many as I want. I regret not thinking of this kid of item. I really do hate the clip that holds the puncher. That screw was so tight that it took forever to loosen it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Yeah right
customer_reviews.text: It will punch a hole in your finger faster and better than it will in a belt !
customer_reviews.author: Richard Vinciguerra

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for home use
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be better for occasional use--maybe you'd need more if you owned a saddle shop? Sturdy. Punches neat holes. I like extra holes in my belts--half sizes--and this does the job just fine for me (see photo). Arrived fast and comes with a nifty little set of accessories for added value. Comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: MarkSteele

customer_reviews.title: A no for me
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in this. My package was first of all damaged, not sealed and the item appeared to have been used and was NOT new. It had scratches and obvious wear on it. It was also unlatched and will not close back. The wheel for the different sizes holes is extremely difficult to turn. Amazon will not refund me either. Honestly I’m sure you can find a better one else where.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Kubisz

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, neat hole punch for leather
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son was able to use this to add extra holes to a belt. It took about 2 minutes. The multiple sizes are nice as we were able to exactly match the existing holes on the belt. The tools to clean out the punch, and the extra base are helpful. Don't know if it was worth the extra couple of dollars compared to cheaper versions, because we did not try cheaper versions, but we feel satisfied with the money we spent. Now we're looking for other things to try it on!
customer_reviews.author: RBM

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this years ago - Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for punching holes in leather belts, shoe straps and other. I've worked my way around for years without it but my daughter needed nice clean hole in strap of expenses shoes. this was perfect. first time out no problems. Keeping it in my tool cabinet with all my special tools. Love it and great value
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Innovator

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making sandal straps tighter
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair or wedges and the strap was too big. So I found this and I was able to make a couple more holes. At first I wasn’t able to figure out how to pick the size of the puncher, but I figured out you just have to push them forward really hard until they spin and then click into place.
customer_reviews.author: Asiamae

customer_reviews.title: Should have brought these long ago, they're great!
customer_reviews.text: After struggling with my very old leather punch I finally brought these and now wish I done this years ago. These are great! Very powerful, really good handles, very comfortable to use and the holes it makes are clean and it pierces the leather beautifully. Great product! Working with leather is a hobby for me, not a profession, these are affordable and make my work so much more fun to do!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R Iverson

customer_reviews.title: seems pretty heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Works well, seems pretty heavy duty. Note that you can only turn the "wheel" one way, due to the way the detente mechanism is designed. That's not a big deal, but a bit annoying if you're going back and forth from one hole size to one right next to it: you might have to click around 5 times to get to the hole size you want. Don't know if other brands are made the same way. This is a heavy duty tool and will probably last me forever of occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Donithan

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: I had to put an extra hole in a pair of sandals that I had bought, and thought I would try out a proper tool, rather than just a hammer and an awl. This is awesome! A great, clean, professional-looking hole was made in seconds! Easy to use and not a lot of pressure required.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Great for watch bands!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add a couple more holes to a leather watch band that was a bit too large for me. The different sizes here were a great, and allowed me to find a perfect size to punch identical holes to the ones already on the watch band. I can't tell the difference between the ones I punched and the ones on the watch, so I'd call that a huge success!
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Best pair I’ve used by far
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally do the reviews but was genuinely Impressed by this whole punch. I couldn’t find my other one when I needed a few more notches on my belt due to stretching. I carry tools on my belt at work so it stretches it...other belts my notches each have a very special story behind each one of them....anyhow this leather punch cuts so crisp! My old one is have to give it a second go at it to make it right. You can even hear the snap as it eats through the leather no problem, and the belts I have are all redwing which is good thick leather.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Rutgers

customer_reviews.title: Good, Clean Punch
customer_reviews.text: Hole punching tool that is easy to use once you get the hang of it. I kept trying to loosen the screw because I couldn't rotate the wheel at all, and I even tried using a drill since the little screwdriver they give you didn't work either... but eventually I figured out that you can only rotate the wheel in one direction, and it was pretty easy to use after that. There was a noticeable dent on the black disk after the first time I punched a hole (without any cardboard to protect the bottom), but the result was a clean punch that suited my needs perfectly. For this reason I give it a positive review.
customer_reviews.author: Yun-Shiuan Lin

customer_reviews.title: This thing is useless
customer_reviews.text: Why spend the money for something my cordless drill can do? I only bought this because I thought it would have something to make the next hole exactly the same distance and size.. but you still have to do the measuring yourself. The hole isn't the same size as my belt.. because it doesn't have an oval shaped punch.. it only has round ones. 3 stars because it works fine and is easy to punch.
customer_reviews.author: yuppicide

customer_reviews.title: Great hole puncher
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hole puncher to replace the old one that broke down. This one is so much better quality than the one i had. It is stronger and came with tools (in the pictures) I so glad I bought it and I have been using this hole puncher a lot to many different material especially leather and it works so well. Very worth my money.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Falco

customer_reviews.title: Great to adding new holes to your belt.
customer_reviews.text: Lost a little weight and some of the belts I bought earlier don't have holes that go far back enough. Bought this, punched a hole where the next one *should* be, and it worked perfectly. The ONLY nitpick would be they didn't include an "oval hole" punch... All punches are for circular holes. But it works and it's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Reviews Romance and MoreTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I previously sent back another leather punch that was too weak to penetrate heavy leather belts without bending. This time I purchased a HEAVY DUTY tool. It easily punches my very heavy leather belts. The included accessories are also very handy in producing a first class finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Troy W

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was much more sturdy than I expected. I needed to add holes to many of my little daughters shoe straps and this did the job great. All the little extra tools that it came with too were great. I’ll definitely be using this more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: It works but . . .
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used the punch few times. It did what it is supposed to do, but I found 2 “major “ issues with the product: 1. Because of the size of the punch, it is difficult to place the punch head precisely where your want it. 2. The instructions say to place a piece of cardboard between the item to be punched and the metal plate under the punch. This makes it more difficult to punch the hole exactly where you want it .
customer_reviews.author: Barry K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for money. It definitely feels a lot sturdier than you’d expect something that costs $11 to be. It may not be suitable for professional use, but it’s perfect for punching the odd extra hole in a belt or shoe strap. It is a little stiff when you change between hole sizes, but overall it’s easy to use and effective. A home toolkit staple.
customer_reviews.author: Annemarie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on my $350
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a brand new Gucci belt that I was so worried about hurting but I needed to make tighter so I got this and it worked perfectly! I practiced on an older cheaper belt to figure out what size hole and how much pressure to apply when using it.
customer_reviews.author: kayla teague

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty hole puncher
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hole puncher to cut holes in leather for riveting. This thing is seriously heavy-duty and performs the job perfectly. When switching hole sizes, it takes some force and rotates into place with a very satisfying click. I was surprised with how easily this tool punches holes in thick and heavy leather. If you need to punch holes in leather, then this is the tool for it!
customer_reviews.author: PDT

customer_reviews.title: Really works!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a good product!! Bought for a belt that I had ended up buying too large and just needed another hole in it. My belt was super thick so I was afraid It wouldn’t punch through. But it went through just fine and the little poker that comes with it has a file that helps to your sand down the holes so they end up perfect. Pics show the thickness of my belt and the new hole by the belts original holes.
customer_reviews.author: Torrey

customer_reviews.title: Heavy & useful
customer_reviews.text: Omg this is heavy as hell. It was a little tricky to learn how to use it and ironically my 12 year old daughter was the one who was able to help me, lol. I love how easy it is to make holes in the belts! It’s definitely worth the money and you get a lot of uses for it.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Wolf

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly a life saver if your petite and have corss body purses that are just way to long to wear, I own so many beautiful bags that I want to wear on a daily but can’t because its uncomfortable due to the length of the straps. This immedietly solved my problems for my bags :) the hole puncher is amazing quality, very sturdy, the grips are comfortable to hold, creates a clean punch. Highly recommend this to have around the house when you need to make any kind of extra hole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing!

customer_reviews.title: Make clean hole in leather belt.
customer_reviews.text: Used the hole punch to shortens and add holes to two belts. One average thickness and one a little thicker. The punch out clean holes in both belts. The pliers open wider than seems necessary but ultimately you can work with it.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: Used this to mark of the inches as I lost 144 lbs
customer_reviews.text: Lost 20 inches so cut off all but one of the old belts. I keep one as a yard stick! Good purchase to gain enthusiasm to loose weight! Funny how minds use neuro-plasticity images to make progress and build new neural pathways as we change!
customer_reviews.author: bendito

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! Made clean accurate holes.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike! Has all the little tools needed for accuracy. I used it to punch an extra hole in my Apple Watch Band looks perfect. Adding a piece of card board (as suggested) to the back of item you are punching, works perfectly. Keep the extra little tools together in the supplied box.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper 898

customer_reviews.title: Pierces right through belts!
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I am giving this an honest 4-star review is because of the build quality. Although it's very nice, ergonomic, compact, and gets the job done, I am not sure how well it will hold up after repeated usage. It is very nice though, and I have used it about 5 times now.
customer_reviews.author: Rubark Established 2014

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality; they are very heavy duty but they are huge and I can barely get my hand around the grips. Also, there are no instructions tell you what the other small items in the box are supposed to do and how to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerjbug

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped Fast! Did exactly what I needed it to do without taking rocket science to figure it out. Great quality for the price! Love it! Hardest part was trying to figure out how to put it back inside the box when I was done lol
customer_reviews.author: Denim

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these already but the mother in-law put it up and I can't get to it. Received this one and it worked great. Fixed hubbies belt and the dogs collar. I had no issues going through the leather and no issues with getting the leather bits out of the hole cutter. I have used these for many years. It doesn't take a Hercules to squeeze and cut leather.
customer_reviews.author: Guttrpnk

customer_reviews.title: This thing is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Saves me money, as I'm always having to shorten purse straps and the shoe repair stores charge so much for just punching a hole in a strap! Now I can do it myself. Works great for belts and anything leather. Haven't tried to for other things, but it's very durable and well made! I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Okie Dokie KO

customer_reviews.title: It just works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality tool that does the job. It makes perfect holes in vinyl, carpet, leather, or anything else you want to punch a true hole through in many different sizes. You don't know that you need this tool until you have it, then, you will wonder how you did what you did without it. When you need it, you will have it. Get one, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly O.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make some extra holes in my Birkenstock sandals. It was awesome! And I have weak hands but was still able to punch new holes with minimal effort. The only problem I had is material is stuck in the hole punch. As soon as I figure out an easy way to get that out I will let y’all know.
customer_reviews.author: Poodlelicious81

customer_reviews.title: Works great for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hole puncher, it has a compound action so it's much easier to cut, and it comes with a couple of nice add-ons. I don't think you can beat it for the money, but I also would not say it is of a professional nature. It's good for the hobbyist and occasional user.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Affordable purchase with a clean punch
customer_reviews.text: Very useful tool to save the trip n money to leather store. Used it on my belt and shoe. It was hard to rotate to the right hole size at first coz it was somehow stuck. Tip to rotate it easier is to follow the arrow and push counterclockwise with one of the hole stem at the base instead of on the top. Overall, a satisfied item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Revolving Punch Plier Kit, XOOL Leather Hole Punch Set for Belts, Watch Bands, Straps, Dog Collars, Saddles, Shoes, Fabric, DIY Home or Craft Projects, Heavy Duty Rotary Puncher, Multi Hole Sizes Make
feature_bullets: 【Multi-function】 Ideal for use on a variety of surfaces. It is an awesome tool. The punch plier is commonly used for punching round holes in leather, belts, plastic, rubber, canvas, fabric, cardboard, saddles, and similar materials; especially useful as a leather hole punch. It has 6 different sizes, which is perfect for home hobby or commercial use. Hole size dimensions: 2mm, 2.5mm, 3mm, 3.5mm, 4mm and 4.5mm. And the six tapers are very sharp to meet the maximum demand.

【High Quality and Safety】 The durable punch plier is made of plated steel that is high hardness, good toughness and durable. The surface of metal deal with spray lacquer process to avoid oxidation. The brass pad adopts the thickness design to guarantee on safety. And in our kits, we add grinding rod on it for easy cleaning.

【Ergonomics Design】 The professional punch plier adopts double lever mechanism to greatly save your strength. Powerful and do not require much strength to get perfect holes. Powerful penetrability makes the work easier. And the punch plier has an anti-slid and environmental protection handle. The non-slip handle provides greater comfort, which guarantee on long-lasting working.
【Convenient Storage】 In the bottom of punch plier, there is a stainless buckle. When you don’t work, you can buckle the safe lock. And the punch plier will become small to save your space.

【Excellent Product Performance】 The unique design of punch plier allows for use with one hand and gives you the ability to create stronger punches; especially useful as a leather hole punch. Convenient spring tension gives superior power and comfort, fits your palm and allows for maximum force output. Comfortable design for easy punching and less hand fatigue.
